mindfulness_exercises.title: Je te Laisserai Des Mots (02:49)
mindfulness_exercises.description: A soothing piano piece that can help in reducing stress and promoting relaxation.

mindfulness_exercises.title: What More Can I Give (5:04)
mindfulness_exercises.description: What More Can I Give is a song performed by choir various artists to promote world peace and unity.

mindfulness_exercises.title: Mountain Meditation (8:12)
mindfulness_exercises.description: Mountain Meditation is a type of guided imagery meditation that involves visualizing yourself as a mountain, steady and strong, while observing your thoughts and feelings as clouds passing by.

mindfulness_exercises.title: Breathing Retraining (10:45)
mindfulness_exercises.description: Breathing Retraining is a technique for reducing your level of anxiety. It is a simple technique that can be used anywhere and at any time.
